description:
### 11.137 inflate

Apply inflate effect to the video.

This filter replaces the pixel by the local(3x3) average by taking into
account only values higher than the pixel.

It accepts the following options:

**threshold0**

**threshold1**

**threshold2**

**threshold3**

    Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
name: inflate

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold0

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold1

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold2

options.description: Limit the maximum change for each plane, default is 65535. If 0, plane will remain unchanged.
options.name: threshold3
